AUT_SERVER_NAME.en: Server Name|The host name or IP address of the LDAP server

AUT_PORT.en: Port|The port of the LDAP server (default: 389)

AUT_ENABLED_TLS.es: Habilitar TLS|Whether to use Transaction Layer Security (TLS), which encrypts traffic to and from the LDAP server No Si
AUT_ENABLED_TLS.en: Enable TLS|Whether to use Transaction Layer Security (TLS), which encrypts traffic to and from the LDAP server No Yes
AUT_ENABLED_TLS.po: Habilitar TLS|Whether to use Transaction Layer Security (TLS), which encrypts traffic to and from the LDAP server No Sim

AUT_BASE_DN.es: Base DN|The location in the LDAP directory to start searching from (CN=Users,DC=mycorp,DC=com)
AUT_BASE_DN.en: Base DN|The location in the LDAP directory to start searching from (CN=Users,DC=mycorp,DC=com)
AUT_BASE_DN.po: Base DN|The location in the LDAP directory to start searching from (CN=Users,DC=mycorp,DC=com)

AUT_SEARCH_USER.es: Search User|The user account in the LDAP directory to perform searches in the LDAP directory as (such as CN=searchUser,CN=Users,DC=mycorp,DC=com or searchUser@mycorp.com)
AUT_SEARCH_USER.en: Search User|The user account in the LDAP directory to perform searches in the LDAP directory as (such as CN=searchUser,CN=Users,DC=mycorp,DC=com or searchUser@mycorp.com)
AUT_SEARCH_USER.po: Search User|The user account in the LDAP directory to perform searches in the LDAP directory as (such as CN=searchUser,CN=Users,DC=mycorp,DC=com or searchUser@mycorp.com)

AUT_SEARCH_PASSWORD.es: Search Password|The password for the user account in the LDAP directory that performs searches
AUT_SEARCH_PASSWORD.en: Search Password|The password for the user account in the LDAP directory that performs searches
AUT_SEARCH_PASSWORD.po: Search Password|The password for the user account in the LDAP directory that performs searches

AUT_SEARCH_ATTRIBUTES.es:
Search Attributes
The LDAP attributes to use to search for users when given their name (one per line, examples: cn, mail)
AUT_SEARCH_ATTRIBUTES.en:
Search Attributes
The LDAP attributes to use to search for users when given their name (one per line, examples: cn, mail)
AUT_SEARCH_ATTRIBUTES.po:
Search Attributes
The LDAP attributes to use to search for users when given their name (one per line, examples: cn, mail)

AUT_OBJECT_CLASSES.es:
Object Classes
The LDAP object classes to search for users (one per line, example: user, inetOrgPerson, posixAccount)
AUT_OBJECT_CLASSES.en:
Object Classes
The LDAP object classes to search for users (one per line, example: user, inetOrgPerson, posixAccount)
AUT_OBJECT_CLASSES.po:
Object Classes
The LDAP object classes to search for users (one per line, example: user, inetOrgPerson, posixAccount)
